title: Player expenses ( payroll ) of LA Galaxy ( MLS ) 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Payroll in thousand U.S. dollars for 30 number of Months.
The maximum Payroll in thousand U.S. dollars 7200.0 is found at Month Zlatan Ibrahimovic and the minimum is found at Diedie Traore where Month is 56.25.
The difference of Payroll in thousand U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Month is 7143.75.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Payroll in thousand U.S. dollars for 30 number of Months.
Month Zlatan Ibrahimovic has the highest Payroll in thousand U.S. dollars and Diedie Traore has the lowest Payroll in thousand U.S. dollars.
Second maximum Payroll in thousand U.S. dollars is found at Month Jonathan dos Santos.
There is a difference of 7143.75 between the maximum Month Zlatan Ibrahimovic and minimum Month Diedie Traore.
Month Zlatan Ibrahimovic is higher than any other Months with value 7200.0, followed by Jonathan dos Santos, and Romain Alessandrini. Down to Month Diedie Traore with the lowest value 56.25.
Over the past 30 Months, the Payroll in thousand U.S. dollars has declined.
Month Emil Cuello, Matt Lampson, and Servando Carrasco have a similar Payroll in thousand U.S. dollars that is 70.25.
The Month Diedie Traore tends to be 11.62 percent lower than average.
